/** * Namespace support for XML document handlers. This class doesn't * perform any error checking and assumes that all strings passed * as arguments to methods are unique symbols. The SymbolTable class * can be used for this purpose. * * @author Andy Clark, IBM * * @version $Id: NamespaceSupport.java,v 1.20 2005/06/23 05:39:17 mrglavas Exp $ */
